skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.
The vast legions of Mannfred von Carstein are inspired to fight more boldly as the bloodied banner is held up high by their standard bearer.
The largest of Mannfred's Grave Guard regiments were charged with protecting Helmut von Carstein at any cost.

effects.description:
No Upkeep for Helmut's Own
	(Hero's army)

Enable Unbreakable attribute for Helmut's Own
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Helmutâ€™s very presence within the Sylvanian legions drastically improves the efficacy of his minions.
Those of the von Carstein bloodline are well respected in Sylvania for their mastery of swordsmanship and necromancy.
Helmut is more than merely a standard bearer; his skill in melee almost rivals those of the famed Blood Dragon Order.
Helmut von Carstein prefers fighting on foot alongside the elite Grave Guard and his own mighty bodyguard.

effects.description:
Enable Unbreakable attribute for Grave Guard
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

effects.description:
Enable Unbreakable attribute for Grave Guard
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Helmut's Own

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

items.colour_text: The tattered banner of the von Carstein bloodline is held high for all to see, its necromantic energies bolstering both the reanimated corpses and unliving warriors who march alongside Helmut.
A powerful artefact, shaped in the crest of the von Carsteins, imbues its wearer with unholy power over the dead.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +10 per turn
Bound ability: Summon the Honour Guard!

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Helmut's Own

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Though he is an experienced commander in his own right, Helmut prefers to be on the front lines, leading the charge.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
